services.serviceDescription: Building websites from scratch using latest frameworks including responsiveness that can be used through phones, tablets and desktop.
Creating designs that is a enchancement of satisfaction to client and improving the look of the projects or publications.
Creating SEO friendly websites that are visible to search engines and increase the traffic of the website with the help of SEO tactics.
Making website accessible via the World Wide Web and giving client/s the file transfer protocol access together with their SQL databases.
Having the ability to create exceptional websites and designs that are a satisfaction to the client/s or to the user.
Creating dynamic web application that can be also downloaded and used in mobile devices with the use of ionic framework.

works.projectDescription: A project made from WEBTECH3 subject where the Heart Haven Hospital uses a system for the hospital to record the appointment of each patient and the access of different users as well as the doctors and the admin with the use of CRUD mechanics.

Came from the project of WEBDTOOLS using Wordpress but now has a new version as a e-commerce website for the project in WEBTECH4. GigaGames is all about selling games online in different platforms like Nintendo3DS, XBOX, PS3, and PS4.

A minimalist website created by Mar Lapuz, Arlan Cabuso and Shernon Severino. Siglo Barbershop is a classic barbershop in pampanga where it serves with kindness and the cleanest haircuts. It is different from the other barbershops, visit Siglo Barbers now to see why.

A website that is cloned to Patatap which produces sounds/beat on every keypress. Letters from A to Z and even the spacebar has their own beat. Other people can play with it and make them a beginner on being a DJ. Note that this website can only be played in desktops or laptops.

This website was made for personal use that include my works, skills, information about me and also how people will contact me with the use of the internet. This website was made with my own capabilities and understanding on being a Web Developer.

others.projectDescription: Personal Logo with my initials made with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. These logos express my personality and what I do. Personal Logo must be unique in a way that it will be your own mark as a designer.
Different types of business cards, invitations, and envelope designs created with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. I create contents to boost it advertisement and design to the public.
